committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to remove certain restrictions on the availability of office space for former Speakers of the House.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1971 to remove certain restrictions on the availability of office space for former Speakers of the House of Representatives. Declares that each former Speaker is entitled to one office, located in the United States, to facilitate the administration, settlement, and conclusion of matters pertaining to incumbency as a Representative or former Speaker.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain restrictions on the availability of office space for former Speakers of the House.
